projects.shortDescription: A web app that makes it easy for you to connect and share messages with your colleagues.

technologies.name: HTML5, ECMAScript 6, Sass, Vue js, Webpack, Eslint, Bootstrap, vue-cli

projectSpecification.leftColumn: My favorite project that require me to push beyond my boundaries and acquire new skills and knowledge. This web app was created with a Vue.js Java Script framework - a great solution for this use case, combined with Webpack Sass and Bootstrap.I develop this app within 2-3 weeks. This is my first project with Vue and I got in touch with API and started to get a feel on how to work and config the views. I use vue-packeges to sent HTTP request. This API should return only approved messages. Also when scroling to the bottom of the messages list, the API should be called with a 'x' offset GET request, so I can get the next couple of messages.
projectSpecification.rightColumn: I was responsible for the overall construction of the app. Another interesting component was the aoutocumplete bar with all the company emails to search from(this is for choosing who to send the message to). And the main feed which showing all the users with there claimed messages. Designed to be a responsive mobile-first web application which I'm developing to phone app with Android and Cordova

projects.shortDescription: Responsive web application for accountant management and client invitation

technologies.name: HTML5  CSS3  Sass  Angular 1  Angular Material  Gulp  Bower Bourbon

projectSpecification.leftColumn: This project is a responsive web application for accountant and client management and is part of another large system Bexio. Angular 1 is the technology we used in the project with my colleagus. For interaction design I choose Angular Material framework which I already knew from a prev. projects. My role and responsibilities as a Front-End developer was to set-up the project, create views, styling app, routing and  basic support for functionality.
projectSpecification.rightColumn: Some of this code which I develop was the header functionality, search directive, sorting, Forms validation, custom Bexio tags for components... At the ending of the project I did a refactoring of my code and for the purpose I used BEM methodology and rewrite and optimize the code.

projects.shortDescription: From British Olympic Association about Games held in Baku 2015

technologies.name: Sitefinity CMS, Java Script, jQuery, Bootstrap, Sass & gulp integration

projectSpecification.leftColumn: TeamGB website was made in collaboration with British Olympic Association. Their role is to lead the promotion of the Olympic Movements. This is a large-scale project that include three smaller ones for their sponsors in which I'm Front-end developer too.
projectSpecification.rightColumn: Sytefinity is the content management sistem which ours teem used to build the site. I have been with the project since its early days. I was responsible for page building and styling, for managing different types of modules and widgets from the Sytefinity CMS. TeamGB is a fully responsive and well tested to support cross-platforms and browsers. The project contains a huge Java Script components, modular structure(reuse blocks and widgets on any page) video components and Facebook integration.
